name: RunZ (itch)
description:
Run for your life ! RunZ is a 2D platformer where you play a survivor who try to escape ! Try to do the Best score. For that, no holds barred, numerous spells appear everywhere, use them correctly, avoid the numerous obstacles, hamper your opponents and the victory belongs to you. But care, you have to be constantly in movement otherwise you will die.. The Game is currently in early development and he is going to be multiplayer in the future !

  • Try to do the Best Score !
  • Lot of various Spell !
  • Post Apocalyptique Zombie-world !
  • Go to the WebSite to vote for the next music to include in the Game !
  • Procedural generation !
  • Unlimited World !

<<Click to go to the website!
